privacy.intro: BingeList ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our Service.
privacy.personalDataDesc: We do not collect any personally identifiable information (PII) from our users. You can browse BingeList anonymously.
privacy.nonPersonalDataDesc: We may collect non-personal data such as browser type, operating system, and usage patterns through analytics tools (e.g., Vercel Analytics, Google Analytics if enabled). This data is anonymized and used to improve the Service.
privacy.cookiesIntro: BingeList uses cookies and local storage to enhance your experience:
privacy.cookieTheme: Theme Preference: We store your dark/light mode preference in local storage so your choice persists across sessions.
privacy.cookieWatchlist: Watchlist: Your watchlist data is stored locally in your browser's local storage. This data is not sent to our servers.
privacy.cookieSearches: Recent Searches: Your recent search queries are stored locally in your browser's local storage for convenience. This data is not sent to our servers.
privacy.cookieTVMaze: TVmaze: The TVmaze API, which provides show data and images, may set cookies. We have no control over these cookies. Please refer to the {tvmazePolicy}.
privacy.cookieAdSense: Google AdSense: If ads are displayed, Google AdSense may use cookies to serve personalized ads. You can manage your ad preferences via {adSettings}.
privacy.cookieVercel: Vercel Analytics: Our hosting provider, Vercel, may use cookies for anonymous analytics. Refer to the {vercelPolicy}.
privacy.cookieConfig: You can configure your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, some features of the Service may not function properly without cookies.
privacy.useDataIntro: We use the collected non-personal data to:
privacy.useDataItem3: Understand and analyze how you use our Service
privacy.useDataItem4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
privacy.retentionDesc: We do not retain any personal data. Non-personal data collected by third-party analytics is retained according to their respective policies. Local storage data (watchlist, theme, searches) is stored on your device until cleared by you or your browser settings.
privacy.rightsDesc: Since we do not collect personal data, there are no specific rights related to personal data processing. For data stored in your local browser storage, you can clear it at any time through your browser settings. For third-party services, please refer to their privacy policies for your rights.
privacy.securityDesc: We implement reasonable security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of non-personal data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.childrenDesc: BingeList is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you learn that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.
privacy.gdprDesc: BingeList aims to be compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) by not collecting personal data and providing transparency about data usage. For third-party services, their GDPR compliance is their responsibility.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via the methods provided on our website.

accessibility.commitmentDesc: BingeList is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards to ensure we provide an inclusive and accessible platform.
accessibility.statusDesc: The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. BingeList is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 Level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not yet fully conform to the accessibility standard.
accessibility.featureKeyboard: Keyboard Navigation: All interactive elements are navigable using a keyboard.
accessibility.featureScreenReader: Screen Reader Compatibility: Content is structured with semantic HTML and ARIA attributes to be compatible with screen readers.
accessibility.featureDarkMode: Dark Mode: A dark mode option is available to improve readability and reduce eye strain for users with light sensitivity.
accessibility.featureSkip: Skip to Content: A "Skip to main content" link is provided for quick navigation.
accessibility.featureLanguage: Clear Language: We strive to use clear and simple language throughout the site.
accessibility.featureFocus: Focus Indicators: Visible focus indicators are provided for interactive elements.
accessibility.limitationsDesc: Despite our best efforts, you may encounter some limitations. These include:
accessibility.limitationThirdParty: Third-Party Content: Some content from external APIs (e.g., TVmaze images) may not fully meet accessibility standards, as we have limited control over their output.
accessibility.limitationDynamic: Dynamic Content: While we strive for accessibility, some dynamic content updates might not be perfectly announced by screen readers.
accessibility.techIntro: BingeList is designed to be compatible with the following assistive technologies:
accessibility.feedbackDesc: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of BingeList. If you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us. We will consider your feedback as we continue to improve the Service.
accessibility.specsIntro: Accessibility of BingeList relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:
accessibility.effortsDesc: Our commitment to accessibility is an ongoing process. We regularly review our website and implement updates to improve accessibility. We aim to conduct periodic accessibility audits and user testing with individuals with disabilities.
